info.name: Nocturnal Twitch Theme.
info.description:
Cleaned up Twitch theme with the Nocturnal color scheme.

Edit it after installing and remove the /* and */ from the first line.
info.additionalInfo:
6.6.17 - Updated to new version of Twitch, changed color scheme to Nocturnal.
24.12.16 - Themed dashboard.
21.12.16 - Fixed chat, changed font.
7.11.16 - Themed more parts, included support for bttv.
19.10.16 - Initial release!
